md:
giải nghĩa từ "pin" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Pin (noun) - ghim, đinh
	+ Meaning: a small, thin piece of metal used for fastening or attaching things
	+ Example: She used a pin to fasten the badge to her lapel.
	+ Related words: needle, clip, staple

* Pin (verb) - ghim, gắn
	+ Meaning: to fasten or attach something with a pin or a similar object
	+ Example: She pinned the note to the bulletin board.
	+ Related words: attach, fasten, stick

* Pin (noun) - số, mã
	+ Meaning: a secret number or code used to access a computer system or a bank account
	+ Example: You need to enter your PIN to withdraw cash from the ATM.
	+ Related words: password, code, key

* Pin (verb) - xác định, quy định
	+ Meaning: to identify or specify something precisely
	+ Example: The researchers pinned down the cause of the disease.
	+ Related words: identify, specify, determine
html:
giải nghĩa từ "pin" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Pin (noun) - ghim, đinh

    • Meaning: a small, thin piece of metal used for fastening or attaching things
    • Example: She used a pin to fasten the badge to her lapel.
    • Related words: needle, clip, staple

  • Pin (verb) - ghim, gắn

    • Meaning: to fasten or attach something with a pin or a similar object
    • Example: She pinned the note to the bulletin board.
    • Related words: attach, fasten, stick

  • Pin (noun) - số, mã

    • Meaning: a secret number or code used to access a computer system or a bank account
    • Example: You need to enter your PIN to withdraw cash from the ATM.
    • Related words: password, code, key

  • Pin (verb) - xác định, quy định

    • Meaning: to identify or specify something precisely
    • Example: The researchers pinned down the cause of the disease.
    • Related words: identify, specify, determine
